title: The Breast in The Room
description: This fascinating sculptural piece recalls the gargoyles of Notre-Dame, though with considerably less architectural competence and spiritual significance. Constructed from a fallen bird box discovered in a garden, this work represents the Terribleist principle of resurrection through renovationâ€”transforming garden debris into high art through sheer audacity.
odourProfile: Ugly smell due to source materials found in old public toilets
philosophicalPotency: Poor potency. The artwork created with little consideration for ideas
investmentAnalysis: Odourful artworks are currently unpopular unless the odour is pleasant. Urine soaked artworks aree seeing a decline
